metadata.title: CVE-2023-35961 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple OS command injection vulnerabilities exist in the decompressionfunctionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted wave file can lead toarbitrary command execution. A victim would need to open a malicious fileto trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concerns decompressionin `vcd_recorder_main`.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
